name: The Stanley Edible
description:
After a puff of the good stuff, Stanley decided it was high time to grab some munchies. He made a list, checked it twice and headed to the grocery store to appease his cravings -- but something was a bit off.

How many different endings can you find?

Made as part of the Pigsquad Summer Slowjam #3 (Technical theme: Parody, Creative theme: Bootleg)

    Controls:
  • Move - Left Stick on Controller, WASD on Mouse/Keyboard
  • Look - Right Stick on Controller, Mouse on Mouse/Keyboard
  • Pick Up/Interact - A on Controller, Left-click on Mouse/Keyboard
  • Open Shopping List - B on Controller, Right-click on Mouse/Keyboard
    Made By:
  • Kyle Erickson - Voice-over
  • Pat Farnach - Game design, Programming, UI
  • Quenten King - 2D Art
  • Wesley Mueller - Game design, Level design, Writing
  • Eric Phillips - Music
